content.question: Let <math alttext="g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> be the function given by <math alttext="g of x, equals, the sine of, open parenthesis, negative x, close parenthesis, plus cosine x, minus 10" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following statements is true for <math alttext="y equals, g of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="y plus 10, equals, the fourth derivative of y, with respect to x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fourth derivative of g of x, equals, open parenthesis, g double prime of x, close parenthesis, squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>4</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>″</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="g double prime of x, minus 10, equals g of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>″</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>=</mo><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></math>

<math alttext="y double prime, equals, the sine of, open parenthesis, negative x, close parenthesis, plus cosine x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>″</mo></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="y plus 10, equals, the fourth derivative of y, with respect to x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

unit.text: 3: Differentiation: Composite, Implicit, and Inverse Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
